actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: To require the Comptroller General of the United States to submit a report on use of time-and-materials and labor contracts and labor category minimums within the Department of Defense, and for other purposes.
short_title: Congressional Oversight of Labor Categories in Defense Contracting Act of 2020

summary.text:
Congressional Oversight of Labor Categories in Defense Contracting Act of 2020

This bill requires the Government Accountability Office (GAO) to report on the use of time-and-materialsand labor contracts and labor category minimums within the Department of Defense. The GAO must brief Congress on issues covered in the report.

titles.title: Congressional Oversight of Labor Categories in Defense Contracting Act of 2020
Congressional Oversight of Labor Categories in Defense Contracting Act of 2020

To require the Comptroller General of the United States to submit a report on use of time-and-materials and labor contracts and labor category minimums within the Department of Defense, and for other purposes.
